definitions.definition: A tropical tree or shrub of the myrtle family, Psidium guajava .
Its yellowish tropical fruit , globular or pear -shaped with thin, yellow, green or brown skin , is often made into jams and jellies .
A medium reddish -pink color , like that of guava flesh (also called guava pink).

main_definition: A tropical tree or shrub of the myrtle family, Psidium guajava .
secondary_definitions: Its yellowish tropical fruit , globular or pear -shaped with thin, yellow, green or brown skin , is often made into jams and jellies .
A medium reddish -pink color , like that of guava flesh (also called guava pink).
